The Evillious Chronicles:
Gluttony Arc Timeline

Completely devour everything in this world,
There’s still room to go in my stomach!
—Evil Food Eater Conchita

Events from EC 212 to EC 325.

This timeline is a work in progress and may be missing information from certain sources.

EC 212

  • The Asmodean region becomes independent from the Beelzenian Empire.[1][2][3][4][5][6]

EC 296

  • November: Banica Conchita is born.[6][7][8]

EC 301

  • Holy Levianta is founded in the former location of the Magic Kingdom of Levianta.[1][2][3][4][5][6]

EC 306

  • March: Megour Conchita dies.[7]

EC 311

  • June: Banica becomes engaged to the 3rd prince of Marlon, Carlos.[7]

EC 312

  • February: The engagement between Carlos and Banica is broken off.[7]

EC 315

  • Banica becomes frequently talked about in the Conchita territory due to her gourmand tendencies.[7]

EC 316

  • January: Banica travels to foreign countries to taste even more varieties of food.[7]

EC 319

  • August: Banica participates in a tomato-eating contest as part of a harvest festival in Grabia, and wins by a significant amount.[7]

EC 321

  • August: Muzuri dies of a heart attack, and Banica succeeds him as the new duke.[7]

EC 323

  • July: Banica collapses due to a mysterious illness but recovers after three days.[7]
  • November: Banica attends a dinner party held in the Oruhari household.[7]

EC 324

  • November: Banica begins refusing all face meetings and relegates directions regarding the territory to Arte and Pollo.[7]

EC 325

  • March: The chef working at Banica's estate, Josef, goes missing.[7]
  • June: A rumor goes around saying that Banica has become a cannibal.[7]
  • July: The Beelzenian Empire tasks Elluka Clockworker with investigating Banica Conchita.[7][8]
  • August: Banica Conchita disappears from her mansion. It's speculated by the public that she ran away to a foreign kingdom. Elluka's investigation is suspended.[1][2][4][5][6][7]

EC 399

  • The Lucifenia territory becomes independent from the Beelzenian Empire, with Lucifenia I becoming the new kingdom's first king.[1][2][3][4][5][6]

References

  1. Evils Kingdom (悪ノ王国), released December 22, 2010.
  2. Entr’acte of Evil: The Daughter of Evil Worldguide, released August 30, 2011.
  3. The Daughter of Evil Schedule Book 2013 (悪ノ娘手帳2013), released December 16, 2012.
  4. Deadly Sins of Evil: Evil Food Eater Conchita (悪ノ大罪　悪食娘コンチータ), released September 24, 2013.
  5. Waltz of Evil: The Deadly Sins of Evil Guidebook (悪ノ円舞曲『悪ノ大罪』ガイドブック), released December 24, 2013.
  6. The Muzzle of Nemesis (ネメシスの銃口), released August 17, 2014.
  7. Evil Food Eater Conchita (revised) (悪食娘コンチータ（改）), released August 10, 2010. PV released October 28, 2010.
  8. Epic of Evil: The Daughter of Evil Fanbook (悪ノ叙事詩「悪ノ娘」ファンブック), released August 26, 2012.
